field.label: Instance
field.help: Choose an instance to create a new peer for.

field.label: Endpoint IP
field.help: Select or enter the public IP/hostname to reach this firewall.

field.label: Endpoint Port
field.help: Port to reach the WireGuard instance (default: 51820).

field.label: Name
field.help: Set the name for this peer.

field.label: Public key
field.help: Public key of this peer. You can generate the key using the private key piped to "wg pubkey".

field.label: Private key
field.help: Private key of this peer, not stored on this host, only used for the configuration below.

field.label: Address
field.help: List of addresses to use on the remote peer, these will be allowed (and optionally routed) from this instance.

field.label: Pre-shared key
field.help: Optional shared secret (PSK) for this peer.

field.label: Allowed IPs
field.help: Select firewall IPs or enter custom networks in CIDR notation (e.g., 10.0.0.0/24).

field.label: Keepalive interval
field.help: Set persistent keepalive interval in seconds.

field.label: DNS Servers
field.help: Select common DNS servers (Google 8.8.8.8, Cloudflare 1.1.1.1) or enter custom ones.

field.label: Store and generate next
field.help: Store the public parts of this peer and generate a keypair for the next.
